thread.section_title: Novotel London Blackfriars - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best hotel I've stayed in London -
thread.title_full: Best hotel I've stayed in London - Review of Novotel London Blackfriars, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: cathyashton
title: Best hotel I've stayed in London -
text: I was amazed at the quality of the facilities at this reasonably priced hotel. The bathroom is always a good indicator of quality and this one reminded me of a top class hotel I stayed in in Vietnam, shower was perfect. The pool and sauna was also very very good. Will use novotel again.
